title: OT131: Open Pride
summary:
Key ideas
- SSC community-approved psychiatrists and therapists around the world now available on Web 2.0 by bubble.is.
- Old sidebar ads are back up including psychiatrist Laura Baur and programming coach James Koppel.
- Comment of the week is the subreddit thread on Disease Causation And Biomedical Science.
- Survey results from If Kim Jong-un Opened A KFC, Would You Eat There?

Key learnings
- The Web 2.0 makes it easier for SSC-community-approved psychiatrists to be added to the list.
- Some previous sidebar ads have returned, including Laura Baur and James Koppel.
- The subreddit thread on Disease Causation And Biomedical Science is the comment of the week.
- The results of the survey at the bottom of If Kim Jong-un Opened A KFC, Would You Eat There? were shared.

Key questions
- None mentioned.
